scripts.deployToLambda: zip -r lambda.zip test node_modules && aws s3 cp lambda.zip s3://thesis-secureinbrowser/lambda.zip && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name THESIS-secureinbrowser --s3-bucket thesis-secureinbrowser --s3-key lambda.zip && rm lambda.zip
scripts.deployToLambdaCreate: zip -r lambdaCreate.zip /createAuth /node_modules && aws s3 cp lambdaCreate.zip s3://thesis-secureinbrowser/lambdaCreate.zip && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name THESIS-secureinbrowser-createAuth --s3-bucket thesis-secureinbrowser --s3-key lambdaCreate.zip && rm lambdaCreate.zip
scripts.windowdeployToLambda: 7z a -tzip -mx=1 -mmt=off lambda.zip ./lambda && aws s3 cp lambda.zip s3://thesis-secureinbrowser/lambda.zip && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name THESIS-secureinbrowser --s3-bucket thesis-secureinbrowser --s3-key lambda.zip && del lambda.zip
